It stars Taiwanese actress Ruby Lin and Mainland actor Chen Kun. ==Main Characters Summary== * Ruby Lin as Si Jia Yi – Sunny girl who sells dolls as a living and has a big crush on Ke Lei. * Chen Kun as Ke Lei – Is Si Jia Yi’s high school friend and loves music. * Yang Xue as Su Yan – works in the hospital and is Ke Lei’s girlfriend. * Jin Li Li as Ke Qin – Ke Lei’s mother ==External links== * Ruby Station * Sina Official Site * TTV official site Category:2000s Chinese television series Category:2002 Chinese television series debuts Category:Chinese romance television series Category:Mandarin-language television shows
